11.content: Who has the Emerald?
11.title: chaos emerald

111.content:
Amy was walking in the forest right by her house. She was daydreaming of her long time crush, Sonic the hedgehog. She was so enrolled in her own fantasy that she didn't notices anything else until she tripped over something.
"Ah. Alright who was dumb enough to leave a..." Amy said picking up what she tripped over.
"A chaos emerald? Whats this doing hear?" Amy asked. "Oh well. I better git this to Sonic." she said to no one in particular.
Amy began walking to town in search of sonic hoping to give him the emerald.
Amy walked into an outside dinner area and saw sonic talking to... ROUGE???
She couldn't believe he was talking to someone link her.
'What does she have that I don't' Amy asked her self in her head.
That's when she saw her breasts.
'Sonic must be attracted to that. Oh... If only i had a chest like Rough' Amy said in her head when the emerald glowed. Enveloping her in the glow.
When it disappeared she felt her her dress feel really tight. She looked down to she her breasts were stretching it.
Seeing this she freaked out and ran home.
"What just happened?"
She looks at the emerald still in her hand
"It must of been you! You did this.' she said to the emerald
Now she had 3 choices, mess with her body, give the emerald to sonic like before or find someone to talk about this with.
111.title: Amy

info.description:
In this story sonic characters can control their or other peoples bodes. If you don't understand look at rule 2.

Rule 1. Eggman can't appear that would be creepy.
Rule 2 when i say control there body i mean bulge size, look, size, age, even gender. Or anything like that. GO NUTS!
Rule 3. NO ONE CAN DIE.
Rule 4. have fun.

Failure to follow any of these rule will make me delete them. If you want to get by the rules, ask me first.
Which means if you see a chapter braking the rules don't tell me. I probably already know.

Now to the story

P.S. this is my first story so help if you can.
